action.content: Turn 0

You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Write your plan for your next actions on the line below your action, starting with "Next actions:".
For example:
> open cupboard
Next actions: take orange, eat orange

You can have up to two objects in your inventory at the same time.

Your goal for this game is: Put the broom on the shelf, the potted plant on the counter and the plate in the wardrobe.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a living room now. There are a couch, a book, a side table and a chair. The book is on the side table. There are passages to a kitchen, a hallway and a bedroom here.

> go to kitchen
Next actions: look for broom, take broom if found
Turn 1
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter and a cupboard. The cupboard is closed. There are passages to a pantry and a living room here.

> open cupboard
Next actions: take broom if found, go to living room if not found
Turn 2
The cupboard is now open. In the cupboard there is a plate.

> take plate
Next actions: go to living room, then to bedroom to find the broom if not in the kitchen
Turn 3
You take the plate. In your inventory you have a plate.

> go to living room
Next actions: go to bedroom, look for broom
Turn 4
You are in a living room now. There are a couch, a book, a side table and a chair. The book is on the side table. There are passages to a kitchen, a hallway and a bedroom here.

> go to bedroom
Next actions: look for broom, take broom if found
Turn 5
You are in a bedroom now. There are a wardrobe and a bed. The wardrobe is closed. There is a passage to a living room here.

> open wardrobe
Next actions: take broom if found, go back to kitchen if not found
Turn 6
The wardrobe is now open. In the wardrobe there is a pillow.

> go to kitchen
Next actions: look for broom in the kitchen, check the pantry if not found
Turn 7
You can't go to a kitchen from here.

> go to living room
Next actions: go to kitchen from the living room, look for broom
Turn 8
You are in a living room now. There are a couch, a book, a side table and a chair. The book is on the side table. There are passages to a kitchen, a hallway and a bedroom here.

> go to kitchen
Next actions: look for broom, check the pantry if not found
Turn 9
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter and a cupboard. The cupboard is open. There are passages to a pantry and a living room here.

> go to pantry
Next actions: look for broom, take broom if found
Turn 10
You are in a pantry now. There are a shelf, a table, a refrigerator and a freezer. The refrigerator is closed. The freezer is closed. There is a passage to a kitchen here.

> open refrigerator
Next actions: if no broom, open freezer; if still no broom, go back to kitchen and recheck cupboard
Turn 11
The refrigerator is now open. In the refrigerator there are a sandwich, a banana, a orange, a apple and a peach.

> open freezer
Next actions: if no broom, go back to kitchen and recheck cupboard; if still no broom, check living room again
Turn 12
The freezer is now open. The freezer is empty.

> go to kitchen
Next actions: recheck cupboard for broom, if not found, go to living room and check there
Turn 13
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter and a cupboard. The cupboard is open. There are passages to a pantry and a living room here.

> check cupboard
Next actions: if no broom, go to living room and check there; if still no broom, check bedroom again
Turn 14
The cupboard is empty. The cupboard is openable and currently open.

> go to living room
Next actions: check for broom in living room, if not found, go to bedroom again
Turn 15
You are in a living room now. There are a couch, a book, a side table and a chair. The book is on the side table. There are passages to a kitchen, a hallway and a bedroom here.

> check living room
Next actions: if no broom, go to bedroom again; if still no broom, recheck all locations
Turn 16
Livingroom is not an entity. (this should not occur.)

> look around
Next actions: if no broom, go to bedroom again; if still no broom, recheck all locations
Turn 17
I don't know how to interpret this 'look' action.

> go to bedroom
Next actions: check bedroom for broom, if not found, recheck all locations carefully
Turn 18
You are in a bedroom now. There are a pillow, a wardrobe and a bed. The pillow is in the wardrobe. The wardrobe is open. There is a passage to a living room here.

> check bedroom
Next actions: if no broom, recheck all locations; consider if any location was missed or if the broom might be in an unexpected place
Turn 19
Bedroom is not an entity. (this should not occur.)

> look around bedroom
Next actions: if no broom, recheck all locations; consider if any location was missed or if the broom might be in an unexpected place
Turn 20
I don't know how to interpret this 'look' action.

> examine bedroom
Next actions: if no broom, recheck all locations; consider if any location was missed or if the broom might be in an unexpected place
Turn 21
Bedroom is not an entity. (this should not occur.)

> search bedroom
Next actions: if no broom, recheck all locations; consider if any location was missed or if the broom might be in an unexpected place
Turn 22
Bedroom is not an entity. (this should not occur.)

> go to kitchen
Next actions: recheck kitchen thoroughly, including under and behind objects; if no broom, consider other rooms again
Turn 23
You can't go to a kitchen from here.

> go to living room
Next actions: from living room, go to kitchen; recheck kitchen thoroughly, including under and behind objects; if no broom, consider other rooms again
Turn 24
You are in a living room now. There are a couch, a book, a side table and a chair. The book is on the side table. There are passages to a kitchen, a hallway and a bedroom here.

> go to kitchen
Next actions: recheck kitchen thoroughly, including under and behind objects; if no broom, consider other rooms again
Turn 25
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter and a cupboard. The cupboard is open. There are passages to a pantry and a living room here.

> check under counter
Next actions: if no broom, check behind counter; if still no broom, go to living room and consider other locations
Turn 26
I don't know what 'under counter' means.

> look behind counter
Next actions: if no broom, check under and around other furniture in the kitchen; if still no broom, go to living room and consider other locations
Turn 27
I don't know how to interpret this 'look' action.

> search kitchen
Next actions: if no broom, go to living room and consider other locations; check if any areas were overlooked
Turn 28
Kitchen is not an entity. (this should not occur.)

> examine counter
Next actions: if no broom, examine cupboard; if still no broom, go to living room and consider other locations
Turn 29
There is nothing on the counter.

> examine cupboard
Next actions: if no broom, go to living room and consider other locations; check if any areas were overlooked
Turn 30
The cupboard is empty. The cupboard is openable and currently open.

> go to living room
Next actions: recheck living room thoroughly; if no broom, go to bedroom and recheck there; ensure all areas are thoroughly searched
Turn 31
You are in a living room now. There are a couch, a book, a side table and a chair. The book is on the side table. There are passages to a kitchen, a hallway and a bedroom here.

> check under couch
Next actions: if no broom, check behind couch; if still no broom, go to bedroom and recheck there; ensure all areas are thoroughly searched
Turn 32
I don't know what 'under couch' means.

> look behind couch
Next actions: if no broom, check under couch; if still no broom, go to bedroom and recheck there; ensure all areas are thoroughly searched
Turn 33
I don't know how to interpret this 'look' action.

> search living room
Next actions: if no broom, go to bedroom and recheck there; ensure all areas are thoroughly searched; consider checking hallway if necessary
Turn 34
Livingroom is not an entity. (this should not occur.)

> examine couch
Next actions: if no broom, examine side table; if still no broom, go to bedroom and recheck there; ensure all areas are thoroughly searched; consider checking hallway if necessary
Turn 35
There is nothing on the couch.

> examine side table
Next actions: if no broom, go to bedroom and recheck there; ensure all areas are thoroughly searched; consider checking hallway if necessary
Turn 36
There is a book on the sidetable.

> take book
Next actions: if no broom, go to bedroom and recheck there; ensure all areas are thoroughly searched; consider checking hallway if necessary; if book is not needed, return it to side table and continue searching
Turn 37
You take the book. In your inventory you have a book and a plate.

> go to bedroom
Next actions: recheck bedroom thoroughly; if no broom, consider checking hallway; ensure all areas are thoroughly searched
Turn 38
You are in a bedroom now. There are a pillow, a wardrobe and a bed. The pillow is in the wardrobe. The wardrobe is open. There is a passage to a living room here.

> check under bed
Next actions: if no broom, check behind bed; if still no broom, go to hallway and check there; ensure all areas are thoroughly searched
Turn 39
I don't know what 'under bed' means.

> look behind bed
Next actions: if no broom, check under bed; if still no broom, go to hallway and check there; ensure all areas are thoroughly searched
Turn 40
I don't know how to interpret this 'look' action.

> search bedroom
Next actions: if no broom, go to hallway and check there; ensure all areas are thoroughly searched; consider any other possible hiding spots
Turn 41
Bedroom is not an entity. (this should not occur.)

> examine bed
Next actions: if no broom, examine wardrobe; if still no broom, go to hallway and check there; ensure all areas are thoroughly searched; consider any other possible hiding spots
Turn 42
There is nothing on the bed.

> examine wardrobe
Next actions: if no broom, go to hallway and check there; ensure all areas are thoroughly searched; consider any other possible hiding spots
Turn 43
There is a pillow in the wardrobe. The wardrobe is openable and currently open.

> go to hallway
Next actions: check hallway thoroughly; if no broom, reconsider all locations; ensure all areas are thoroughly searched; think of any other possible places the broom might be hidden
Turn 44
You can't go to a hallway from here.

> go to living room
Next actions: from living room, go to hallway; check hallway thoroughly; if no broom, reconsider all locations; ensure all areas are thoroughly searched; think of any other possible places the broom might be hidden
Turn 45
You are in a living room now. There are a couch, a side table and a chair. There are passages to a kitchen, a hallway and a bedroom here.

> go to hallway
Next actions: check hallway thoroughly; if no broom, reconsider all locations; ensure all areas are thoroughly searched; think of any other possible places the broom might be hidden
Turn 46
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a living room and a broom closet here.

> go to broom closet
Next actions: check broom closet for broom; if found, take broom; if not, recheck all locations one last time; ensure all areas are thoroughly searched
Turn 47
You are in a broom closet now. There are a broom and a mop. The broom is on the floor. The mop is on the floor. There is a passage to a hallway here.

> take broom
Next actions: go to living room; put broom on the shelf; then find the potted plant and put it on the counter; finally, put the plate in the wardrobe
Turn 48
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.

> drop plate
Next actions: take broom; go to living room; put broom on the shelf; then find the potted plant and put it on the counter; finally, put the plate in the wardrobe
Turn 49
I don't know how to interpret this 'drop' action.

> leave plate
Next actions: take broom; go to living room; put broom on the shelf; then find the potted plant and put it on the counter; finally, put the plate in the wardrobe
